title: Top 10 trending phones of week 20
description: A couple of major announcements came this week and they are the two phones topping our trending chart. The Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge with its svelte body ended up ahead of the Sony Xperia 1 VII, but both phones got a lot of attention from you guys. [#InlinePriceWidget, 13506, 1#] Samsung Galaxy A56 rounded up the podium, while the company's Galaxy S25 Ultra flagship came in fourth. Redmi Turbo 4 Pro slid to fifth, while the upcoming Civi 5 Pro came in right behind it. Poco X7 Pro in seventh makes it three Xiaomi phones in a row, while the iPhone 16 Pro Max retained its eighth...

html:
A couple of major announcements came this week and they are the two phones topping our trending chart. The Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge with its svelte body ended up ahead of the Sony Xperia 1 VII, but both phones got a lot of attention from you guys.

Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge

These are the best offers from our affiliate partners. We may get a commission from qualifying sales.
256GB 12GB RAM$ 1,099.99£ 1,099.00
512GB 12GB RAM$ 1,099.99£ 1,099.00
Show all prices

Samsung Galaxy A56 rounded up the podium, while the company's Galaxy S25 Ultra flagship came in fourth.

Redmi Turbo 4 Pro slid to fifth, while the upcoming Civi 5 Pro came in right behind it.

Poco X7 Pro in seventh makes it three Xiaomi phones in a row, while the iPhone 16 Pro Max retained its eighth position.

In ninth we have the Tecno Camon 40 Pro, while the OnePlus 13T completes this edition of the trending chart.
